name: WOLF – WordPress Posts Bulk Editor and Manager Professional
author: realmag777

sections.description:
WOLF – WordPress Posts Bulk Editor and Manager Professional (former name is WPBE) is WordPress plugin for managing, bulk edit and bulk delete WordPress posts, pages and custom post types data edit/delete in robust and flexible way. This plugin helps with managing real estate catalogs, cars and all another WordPress custom post types. Be professionals with managing data of your site!

Latest PHP 8.x – FULL COMPATIBILITY!

Supported Types

ATTENTION: THIS PLUGIN DOESN WORK CORRECTLY WITH WOOCOMMERCE PRODUCTS! FOR WOOCOMMERCE BULK EDIT USE BEAR

The plugin Features:

✅ Bulk Editing of WordPress fields, taxonomies, meta fields

✅ [Bulk Deleting] – delete posts and custom post types in bulk using any filter combinations

✅ Filtering fields for further bulk editing or export

✅ Export share selected data with your partners

✅ History of Bulk and Solo operations with roll-back possibility

✅ Add necessary Meta Fields to the system and manage by them. JSONed (serialized) metadata bulk editing is possible with nice popup where data constructor is in-built!

✅ Calculator for decimal meta fields

✅ Binded editing – edit several posts with two clicks!

✅ Nice and convenient WordPress Posts Editor with rich HTML elements

✅ Instant saving of entered data by AJAX

✅ Automatic attach of any taxonomies related to the posts for further editing

✅ POSSIBILITY of joint editing of the posts without interference to each other.

✅ Profiles for any set of columns for quick loading

✅ Profiles for any filters combination for quick loading

✅ Filter by empty TEXT meta fields for bulk operations

✅ Hook wpbe_wrap_field_val, allows to customize column cell content

✅ Randomizer for numeric meta fields

✅ WPML Compatible

  • Documentation
  • Get the premium version
  • Support

Fields possible to edit (in bulk) in FREE version of the plugin:

  • Thumbnail
  • Title
  • Content
  • Password
  • Post Status
  • Sticky
  • Thumbnail
  • Date Published
  • Date Modified GMT
  • Menu order
  • 1 taxonomy (maybe Category)
  • Meta
  • 2 product meta fields
  • 2 history records

In the premium version of the plugin it is possible to manipulate with all fields of the posts + Bulk Delete

You can get premium version of the plugin on CodeCanyon

Make your site more profitable with next powerful scripts:

✅ BEAR – WooCommerce Bulk Editor and Products Manager Professional: WordPress plugin for managing and bulk edit WooCommerce Products data in robust and flexible way! Be professionals with managing data of your woocommerce e-shop!

✅ MDTF – WordPress Meta Data Filter and Taxonomies Filter: the plugin for filtering and searching WordPress content in posts and their custom types by taxonomies and meta data fields. The plugin has very high flexibility thanks to its rich filter elements and in-built meta fields constructor!

✅ WOOF – Products Filter for WooCommerce: products filter plugin for WooCommerce that allows your customers filter products by categories, attributes, products tags, products custom taxonomies and price – a must have plugin for your WooCommerce online store!

✅ WOOCS – Currency Switcher for WooCommerce: is WooCommerce multi currency plugin, that allows your site visitors switch products prices currencies according to set currencies rates in the real time and pay in the selected currency (optionally). Allows to add any currency for WooCommerce store!

✅ TABLEON – WordPress Post Tables Filterable: WordPress plugin for displaying site posts and their custom post types in table format. Tables makes focus for your customers on the things they want to get, nothing superfluous, just what the client wants, and full attention to what is offered!

✅ WPCS – WordPress Currency Switcher: is a WordPress plugin that allows to switch currencies and get their rates converted in the real time on your site!

✅ MDTF – WordPress Meta Data Filter and Taxonomies Filter: the plugin for filtering and searching WordPress content in posts and their custom types by taxonomies and meta data fields. The plugin has very high flexibility thanks to its rich filter elements and in-built meta fields constructor!

License

This plugin is copyright pluginus.net © 2012-2024 with GNU General Public License by realmag777.

This program is free software; you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by the Free Software Foundation; either version 2 of the License, or (at your option) any later version.

This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY. See the GNU General Public License for more details.
sections.installation:
1. In your WordPress Dashboard go to “Plugins” -> “Add Plugin”.
  2. Search for “WOLF”.
  3. Install the plugin by pressing the “Install” button.
  4. Activate the plugin by pressing the “Activate” button.
  5. Go to wp-admin/admin.php?page=wpbe
  6. Manage your posts and their custom post types as you needed.

Minimum Requirements

  • WordPress version 4.9 or greater.
  • PHP version 5.6 or greater.
  • MySQL version 5.7 or greater.

Recommended Requirements

  • Latest WordPress version.
  • PHP version 8.0 or greater.
  • MySQL version 8.0 or greater, or MariaDB 10.5 or greater.
sections.faq:
Why would I need this?

You need if you want to change a posts data in bulk: title, content, meta fields, post type, taxonomies and etc.
See full list of fields and features on the plugin site

Where can I get the Premium version of WOLF

Get it on CodeCanyon

Documentation?

https://bulk-editor.pro/documentation/

I have an idea about the plugin, can I discuss it with you?

https://pluginus.net/support/forum/wpbe-wordpress-posts-bulk-editor-professional/

How to create a custom taxomomy?

Use this plugin https://wordpress.org/plugins/custom-post-type-ui/

More answers?

https://bulk-editor.pro/how-to-list/

sections.screenshots: 1. The plugin settings
sections.reviews:
great plugin + great support

By gdvine on August 21, 2023

Been using the free version for a while but then after I received such good support on their website I sprang for the Pro, so very useful for Post management

Very useful plugin

By omc123 on July 1, 2023

Very useful plugin that helps me get things done fast. Ajax gives feeling like MS Excel when I update a field. When I open html tag in front of a text in the editor, it will close the tag automatically after I enter, this saves time!

Real Time Saver!

By Bill Kochman (WordWeaver777) on May 9, 2023

I had to add over 4,300 posts to a new category on my blog. Doing it manually would have taken a very long time. With this plugin, I was able to do it in less than an hour!

Great plugin, much faster modification of posts.

By hoseferrera on March 27, 2023

Nice plugin! Thanks a lot..

Excellent

By ابوالقاسم کریمی (farzandezamiin) on March 11, 2023

Excellent

WOLF - WordPress Posts Bulk Editor

By also4her on January 23, 2023

great product easy and fast to use

Simple Interface, easy to use

By rockthan on January 11, 2023

I rarely review on Wordpress.org but this plugin made my day. So, That's why I give 5* here!

Thanks!

Speeds up the copy-paste work ;)

By Vesa Nippala (nippala) on November 8, 2022

Easy to use and works just as it should.

Gooood bulk'a

By denisword7 on September 8, 2022

Nice plugin guys! Thanks a lot*

The most indispensable tool for high-load editing.

By coppoc on July 14, 2022

Для меня плагин стал широкими воротами в мир мультиблогинга. Не то, чтобы я не делал это раньше, просто получалось скверно из-за сильной загруженности. Когда понадобилось снова развивать сеть, я произвёл анализ предыдущей работы и сформулировал проблему - огромная потеря времени на бессмысленные в общем-то операции (перемещения по страницам, переавторизация, лишняя загрузка страниц). Всё это, как оказалось, сжирало до 70-75% рабочего времени. Поэтому требования к поиску редакторского плагина были сформированы изначально и поиск вёлся целенаправленно. Не скажу, что нашёл быстро и много, но аналоги были. Всё-таки число высоконагруженных изданий на движке ВП растёт и люди явно задумываются над тем, как оптимизировать свой труд. После изучения найденного осталось всего 2 претендента, но без лишней лирики скажу сразу, что альтернативный просто на поколение отстаёт от этого редактора. Принцип тот же, но вот такой степени продуманности таблицы и гибкости в настройках нет. Что, собственно, требовалось и какие преимущества я вижу для себя: 1. Плагин позволяет неделями не посещать другие страницы админки хорошо настроенного ВП. Основная масса моего рабочего времени сосредоточена на его таблице без какой либо перезагрузки страницы вообще и на странице комментариев. 2. Настройка таблицы очень гибкая и перечислять весь набор инструментов для неё просто не имеет смысла, так как это всё равно не передаст степень удобства, которой можно добиться. С небольшим допилом CSS через сниппет моя таблица постов и модальное окно с редактором стали вообще шедевром. 3. Всё обрабатывается крайне быстро. Т.е. не возникает компенсаторики, когда экономия времени за счёт овалившейся загрузки страниц компенсируется долгой обработкой запросов - всё летает, и экономия времени и трудозатрат существенны. ------------------- 
For me, the plugin has become a wide gateway to the world of multiblogging. It's not that I haven't done it before, it just turned out badly because of the heavy workload. When it was necessary to develop the network again, I analyzed the previous work and formulated the problem - a huge waste of time on generally meaningless operations (functions scattered across pages, reauthorization, extra page loading). All this, as it turned out, consumed up to 70-75% of working time. Therefore, the requirements for the search for an editorial plugin were formed initially and the search was conducted purposefully. I won't say that I found it quickly and a lot, but there were analogues. After all, the number of highly loaded publications on the WP engine is growing and people are clearly thinking about how to optimize their work. After studying what was found, there were only 2 applicants left, but without unnecessary lyrics, I will say right away that the alternative is just a head behind this editor. The principle is the same, but there is no such degree of thoughtfulness of the table and flexibility in the settings.
What, in fact, was required and what advantages do I see for myself:
1. The plugin allows you not to visit other admin pages of a well-configured VP for weeks. The bulk of my working time is focused on his page without any reloading at all and on the comments page.
2. Setting up of the working panelis very flexible and it just doesn't make sense to list the entire set of tools for it, since it still won't convey the degree of convenience that can be achieved. With a little finishing of CSS through a snippet, my table of posts and a modal window with an editor became a masterpiece in general.
3. Everything is processed extremely quickly. That is, there is no compensatory situation when time savings due to unnecessary page loading are compensated by long processing of requests - everything flies, and time and labor savings are significant.

short_description: WOLF (formerly WPBE) - a WordPress plugin for managing posts, pages, and custom types easily. Perfect for real estate, cars, etc.
